name: Poopin Reindeer
description:
Can you save Christmas by stopping the reindeer from pooping on the presents? Poopin Reindeer is fun for the whole family. Enjoy this game all year round!

"This app is very funny and fun to play!"

"This app is great! Everyone should get it!"

Objective:

Save Christmas by stopping the reindeer from pooping on the presents.

To stop the reindeer use your snowball cannon to shoot snowballs at the reindeer. If you hit a reindeer, it will explode and you will get 50 points for each reindeer you hit. You will lose 25 points for each reindeer that flies off the screen without getting hit.


3 Skill Levels to choose from!

To win, complete all the levels to save Christmas.

100 points will be deducted for each present that gets pooped on.

If 3 presents get pooped on in any level, you loose.

Merry Christmas!


* If you like this app, please write a review and also share this app with your friends on Facebook and Twitter. Thank you.

** If you are experiencing technical problems with this app, or if you have ideas on how to make this app better, please contact us by pressing the "App Support" button located in the Information screen.

Thank you.
